name: Light the Match 4: Burn them all
name_original: Light the Match 4: Burn them all
description:
The epic conclusion to the "Light the Match saga" everybody waited for!
You wonder where was the Match in Cut the Food and Pack the items? Well, they were preparing their revenge !
Take control of the match, burn everything, every single item from the previous games. You can even burn the developper, the pesky developer who allowed them to take the match's place!

Credits: The picture used to represent the developer is a sprite from Little Runmo, which was modified by Subject Omega.
